creator: Restless Magazine
descriptionHtml:
The social network building a better digital world for women.

The female experience is often isolating. Whether you’re getting over a breakup, healing your trauma, or a founder striking out on your own, we’ve got your back. Make meaningful connections, give and receive advice, and express yourself in a safe space online.

Welcome to the Restless Network.

CURATION - We’re a mindful social networking app, and you’re in charge. Customize your newsfeed and only engage with the content that you want to see. Follow your faves, curate your space, and build a digital world that works for you.



CONNECTION - We’re all about growing a community for connection, not for clout. Whether you’re looking for friendship, networking or advice, there’s something for everyone. Join topical public feeds to connect authentically over shared interests, and DM 1:1 or in group chats.



RESOURCES - We’re busting taboos, boo! Discover our resources to access information that really helps. Find expert lead content on sex and relationships, mental health, work and money, #MeToo and more - this is your safe space to learn and grow.



SUPPORT - We’re changing how people use social media. Wave goodbye to follower counts, the pressure to get likes, and so much more. We reward users for helping others. So join the conversation in your very own digital support network! This is a place to share your thoughts, give support to others, and ask for advice when you need it. All in a safe space, full of women who really get it.
descriptionShort: A safe space for women online

SUPPORT - We’re changing how people use social media. Wave goodbye to follower counts, the pressure to get likes, and so much more. We reward users for helping others. All in a safe space, full of women who really get it.

It’s only when we tell our stories that the narrative starts to change.

This is our digital utopia.

CURATION - We’re a mindful social networking app, and you’re in charge. Customize your newsfeed and only engage with the content that you want to see. Follow your fave topics and people, curate your space, and build a digital world that works for you.

This is just the beginning of many amazing new launches coming over the next few months, and we can’t wait to show you what else we’ve been working on!

title: Communia

creator: Restless Network LLC
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Communia — the social self-care network building a better digital world for women and non-binary-folx.

We’re tired of the internet revolving around the male gaze - so we built a safe space for you to spark meaningful connections, access community support and find resources + tools to get you through life’s best (and worst) moments. Whether you’re reading this on your way to work, crying in the bathroom stall (we’ve all been there), or planning your next adventure - we’re here to support.

Be your unedited self on Communia. All users are verified by human moderators, which means no trolls, no bots and no fake accounts. Share your experience, your wisdom and your opinions. Crowdsource advice from tens of thousands of women+ who really get it, and support others on their journeys too.

From our members:
“Finally, no creepy guys invading my DMs!” — Lizzie
“Whenever I'm struggling and I don't know where to go, I know I can use this app, and that's so comforting.” — Amy
“The identity verification process is worth it for such an authentic community, we're empowered to be vulnerable because of it.” — Tasha

Our app features both SOCIAL and SELF tools to help support you in your daily life.

Communia SOCIAL Features:
- CUSTOMIZABLE NEWS FEED: Only engage with the content that you want to see. Follow your fave topics and people, curate your space, and build an authentic digital world that works for you. Whether you’re looking for friendship, networking or advice, there’s something for everyone
- RESOURCES: Find expert-led content on Sex and Relationships, Mental Health, Work & Money, #MeToo and more - this is your safe space to learn and grow.
- SHARE: Learn something noteworthy about life, love, or the universe today? Have a question and need support? Post publicly in our feed and customise with GIFs and polls!
- IDENTITY PROTECTION: Have a sensitive question you’d feel more comfortable being anonymous in asking about? We’ve got you! Use our anonymous posting tool to have that conversation you’ve been too intimidated to initiate.

Communia SELF Features — Your self-developmental toolbox:
- CUSTOMIZABLE JOURNALS: Personalise your journal aesthetic to fit your vibe.
- SECRET & COLLABORATIVE JOURNALS: Journal privately or publicly depending on your mood. Create collaborative journals with your friends to encourage one another and hold each other accountable. Share mindfulness techniques and achieve your goals solo, as a group, or with the broader community.
- MULTIMEDIA JOURNAL ENTRIES: Text, quote, images, and links.
- JOURNAL PROMPTS: For those moments you might need support or guidance.
- GOAL TRACKING (BETA): Our newest feature empowers you to build healthy habits and routines that nourish you. Create your own goals or try one of our suggestions. Integrated with our built-in calendar,streaks, and progress reports to help you fully visualise your success!
- DISCOVER: Find journals by tens of thousands of like-minded women+ and follow/save your faves!

*Non-subscription members can access all sections of Communia SOCIAL, and will be able to create and access public journal content in Communia SELF for free!

*Subscribed members will be able to access everything, including private and collaborative journals in Communia SELF, Goal Tracking (currently in beta), and future features (mood tracking, anyone?!) with a premium membership.

Sign up now to get our early user discount of 2.99 a month!

Your subscription allows us to truly be an ethical company that doesn’t sell user data or or allow advertisements on the app. Partially monetizing in this way allows us to continue improving and adding features to enhance your experience as a member of our digital utopia. We are so happy you're here and are forever appreciative of your support.

Questions? care@ourcommunia.com Privacy Policy: https://ourcommunia.com/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://web.restlessnetwork.com/terms
descriptionShort: Advice Goals Self Care Friends

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Character limits! We’ve extended them to 4000 maximum for standard entries.

Our developers have made it possible for users to see their own content in our Discover section.

You can now copy and paste text-based content from your favourite sources with our latest bug fix!

Good news! We’ve fixed the plus button not working on the Communia SELF section. Now you’ll be able to create new entries whenever you have something to manifest, or to write about the best (or worst) day ever.

title: Communia

creator: Restless Network LLC
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Communia — the social self-care network building a better digital world for women and non-binary-folx.

We’re tired of the internet revolving around the male gaze - so we built a safe space for you to spark meaningful connections, access community support and find resources + tools to get you through life’s best (and worst) moments. Whether you’re reading this on your way to work, crying in the bathroom stall (we’ve all been there), or planning your next adventure - we’re here to support.

Be your unedited self on Communia. All users are verified by human moderators, which means no trolls, no bots and no fake accounts. Share your experience, your wisdom and your opinions. Crowdsource advice from tens of thousands of women+ who really get it, and support others on their journeys too.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Introducing our latest feature: Mood Boards (beta)! Log feelings & gain insight into your emotions over time. Choose from 20 unique emojis ranging from high to low on a positivity scale. Select the factor that’s impacting you the most and see how it changes your mental health. Select from tons of options: money, friendships, your crush, and more. View how you’re feeling over the last week, month, and year. Review your Mood Board report to see changes over time. Also bug fixes & improvements.

title: Communia — Social Self Care

creator: Restless Network LLC
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Communia — the social self-care network building a better digital world for women and non-binary-folx.

Our app features both SELF and SOCIAL tools to help support you in your daily life.

Communia SELF Features — Your self-developmental toolbox:
- CUSTOMIZABLE JOURNALS: Personalise your journal aesthetic to fit your vibe.
- MOOD BOARD (beta): Our newest feature helps you understand your emotions over time, and what’s causing them. Fully integrated with our calendar, select how you’re feeling today or how you felt in the past. See what percent of our community is feeling the same way you are.
- GOAL TRACKING: Empowering you to build healthy habits and routines that nourish you. Create your own goals or try one of our suggestions. Integrated with our built-in calendar,streaks, and progress reports to help you fully visualise your success!
- JOURNAL PROMPTS: For those moments you might need support or guidance.
- SECRET & COLLABORATIVE JOURNALS: Journal privately or publicly depending on your mood. Create collaborative journals with your friends to encourage one another and hold each other accountable. Share mindfulness techniques and achieve your goals solo, as a group, or with the broader community.
- MULTIMEDIA JOURNAL ENTRIES: Text, quote, images, and links.
- DISCOVER: Find journals by tens of thousands of like-minded women+ and follow/save your faves!

Communia SOCIAL Features:
- IDENTITY PROTECTION: Have a sensitive question you’d feel more comfortable being anonymous in asking about? We’ve got you! Use our anonymous posting tool to have that conversation you’ve been too intimidated to initiate.
- RESOURCES: Find expert-led content on Dating and Relationships, Mental Health, Work & Money, and more - this is your safe space to learn and grow.
- CUSTOMIZABLE NEWS FEED: Only engage with the content that you want to see. Follow your fave topics and people, curate your space, and build an authentic digital world that works for you. Whether you’re looking for friendship, networking or advice, there’s something for everyone
- SHARE: Learn something noteworthy about life, love, or the universe today? Have a question and need support? Post publicly in our feed and customise with GIFs and polls!

We’re tired of the internet revolving around the male gaze - so we built a safe space for you to spark meaningful connections, access community support and find resources + tools to get you through life’s best (and worst) moments.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Here's what we've fixed in our latest version!

- An issue where supporting someone’s reply would display it as a duplicate.
- A previous goal being briefly visible while a new goal was loading.

- Issues editing journals with photos attached.

Plus! A few design updates to journal details and cover images.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Introducing guided journals! The self care side of the app centers on our multi-media journaling tool because we know journaling is one of the most powerful and accessible tools available to connect with ourselves. That’s why we created a brand new library of guided journals! Another step in our system of social support. Choose from topics like gratitude, mindful dating, weekly goal setting, anxiety, creativity, and dreams! Plus, checkout our new Self homepage.

title:
Communia — Social Self Care
4.2.0

container.value: 7301 Honeywell Lane, Bethesda, Maryland, 20814, United States

creator: Restless Network LLC
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Communia — the social self-care network building a better digital world for women and non-binary-folx.

We’re tired of the internet revolving around the male gaze and often making our IRL experience worse - so we built a safe space for you to express yourself, create meaningful connections, access community support, + grow with tools designed to elevate life’s best moments and provide a roadmap during the worst.

Be your unedited self on Communia. All users are verified by human moderators, which means no trolls, no bots and no fake accounts. Share your experience, your wisdom and your opinions. Crowdsource advice from hundreds of thousands of women+ who really get it, and support others on their journeys too.

Our app features both social and self reflective tools to help create healthy connection.

Connect with your inner self:
- - DAILY JOURNAL PROMPTS: Because free journaling can be intimidating. Ideas for self discovery.
CUSTOMIZABLE, MULTIMEDIA JOURNALS: Personalise your journal aesthetic to fit your vibe & bring joy.
- SECRET & COLLABORATIVE JOURNALS: Journal privately, with friends, or publicly depending on your mood. Collaborative journaling can encourage your friend group and help hold each other accountable, while public journals invite insights & motivation from a community of people who have been there too.
- GUIDED JOURNALS: Extra support on topics like creativity, gratitude, self-compassion, anxiety, and mindful dating.
- MOOD BOARD: Our newest feature helps you understand your emotions over time, and what’s causing them. See what percent of our community is feeling the same way you are, and know you're not alone.
- GOAL TRACKING: Empowering you to build healthy habits and routines! Create your own goals or try one of our suggestions. Integrated with our built-in calendar, with streaks and progress reports to help you fully visualise your success!
- DISCOVER: Read journals by hundreds of thousands of like-minded women+ and follow/save what impacts you most.

Connect with others:
- A NEWSFEED YOU CONTROL: Only engage with the content that you want to see. Follow the topics you're comfortable with and easily switch it up depending on how you feel. Curate your space, and build an authentic digital world that works for you.
- IDENTITY PROTECTION: Our anonymous posting tool helps you open discussions you're intimidated by, and we don't have a web app specifically so your content doesn't show up on search engines.
- OPEN DISCUSSIONS: No topic is off limits. Our most popular ones include dating and relationships, mental health, #MeToo, work and more - this is your safe space for it all.
- DO SOMETHING KIND: It's easy to help others here. Trade in doom scrolling for giving another woman advice on something you've experienced too.

From our community:
“Finally, no creepy guys invading my DMs!” — Lizzie
“Whenever I'm struggling and I don't know where to go, I know I can use this app, and that's so comforting.” — Amy
“The identity verification process is worth it for such an authentic community, we're empowered to be vulnerable because of it.” — Tasha

We've made a commitment not to sell user data or allow advertisements on the app. Instead, we generate revenue through our premium wellness subscription. Don't worry, the entire social experience will always remain free. Private journaling and daily journal prompts are free too! Past journal prompts (a library of thousands), 7 guided journals, + mood and goal tracking makeup the premium subscription. These added value features help you take action on the topics you discuss with us, and the financial support allows us to continue improving your app experience and pay our small team of women fairly (no billionaires were involved in the making of this app!). We are so happy you're here and are forever appreciative of your support.

Questions? care@ourcommunia.com Privacy Policy: https://ourcommunia.com/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://web.restlessnetwork.com/terms
descriptionShort: Where connection is care. Access a safe & healthy social network by us, for us.

creator: Restless Network LLC
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Communia — the social self-care network building a better digital world for women and non-binary-folx.

We’re tired of the internet revolving around the male gaze and often making our IRL experience worse - so we built a safe space for you to express yourself, create meaningful connections, access community support, + grow with tools designed to elevate life’s best moments and provide a roadmap during the worst.

Be your unedited self on Communia. All users are verified by human moderators, which means no trolls, no bots and no fake accounts. Share your experience, your wisdom and your opinions. Crowdsource advice from hundreds of thousands of women+ who really get it, and support others on their journeys too.

Our app features both social and self reflective tools to help create healthy connection.

Connect with your inner self:
- - DAILY JOURNAL PROMPTS: Because free journaling can be intimidating. Ideas for self discovery.
CUSTOMIZABLE, MULTIMEDIA JOURNALS: Personalise your journal aesthetic to fit your vibe & bring joy.
- SECRET & COLLABORATIVE JOURNALS: Journal privately, with friends, or publicly depending on your mood. Collaborative journaling can encourage your friend group and help hold each other accountable, while public journals invite insights & motivation from a community of people who have been there too.
- GUIDED JOURNALS: Extra support on topics like creativity, gratitude, self-compassion, anxiety, and mindful dating.
- MOOD BOARD: Our newest feature helps you understand your emotions over time, and what’s causing them. See what percent of our community is feeling the same way you are, and know you're not alone.
- GOAL TRACKING: Empowering you to build healthy habits and routines! Create your own goals or try one of our suggestions. Integrated with our built-in calendar, with streaks and progress reports to help you fully visualise your success!
- DISCOVER: Read journals by hundreds of thousands of like-minded women+ and follow/save what impacts you most.

Connect with others:
- A NEWSFEED YOU CONTROL: Only engage with the content that you want to see. Follow the topics you're comfortable with and easily switch it up depending on how you feel. Curate your space, and build an authentic digital world that works for you.
- IDENTITY PROTECTION: Our anonymous posting tool helps you open discussions you're intimidated by, and we don't have a web app specifically so your content doesn't show up on search engines.
- OPEN DISCUSSIONS: No topic is off limits. Our most popular ones include dating and relationships, mental health, #MeToo, work and more - this is your safe space for it all.
- DO SOMETHING KIND: It's easy to help others here. Trade in doom scrolling for giving another woman advice on something you've experienced too.

From our community:
“Finally, no creepy guys invading my DMs!” — Lizzie
“Whenever I'm struggling and I don't know where to go, I know I can use this app, and that's so comforting.” — Amy
“The identity verification process is worth it for such an authentic community, we're empowered to be vulnerable because of it.” — Tasha

We've made a commitment not to sell user data or allow advertisements on the app. Instead, we generate revenue through our premium wellness subscription. Don't worry, the entire social experience will always remain free. Private journaling and daily journal prompts are free too! Past journal prompts (a library of thousands), 7 guided journals, + mood and goal tracking makeup the premium subscription. These added value features help you take action on the topics you discuss with us, and the financial support allows us to continue improving your app experience and pay our small team of women fairly (no billionaires were involved in the making of this app!). We are so happy you're here and are forever appreciative of your support.

Questions? care@ourcommunia.com Privacy Policy: https://ourcommunia.com/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://web.restlessnetwork.com/terms
